comments:
Build: I-20040121

I was working and minding my own business, when all of a sudden an error 
dialog popped up telling me that an error occurred during the periodic save.
The following exception was found in the log:

Error Jan 25, 2004 19:24:29.119 An internal error occurred during: "Periodic 
workspace save.".

There were thread-safety problems in this code, but I believe I have fixed them.
Please reopen if you see this again.
